DOC.brief_summary: Randomized control trial compare method tenaculum placement intrauterine device insertion effect pain . The two method compare slow tenaculum placement versus tenaculum placement time cough . Subjects ask rate pain use visual analog scale . Primary outcome measure pain time tenaculum placement . Secondary outcome overall pain intrauterine device insertion provider satisfaction tenaculum placement .
DOC.detailed_description: The two commonly described strategy tenaculum placement , slow versus patient cough tenaculum place utilized provider base preference and/or previous training . There publish study compare method one another . The investigator aim compare strategy , slow tenaculum placement versus cough method , effect pain time placement . 96 subject randomize method . The subject asked rate pain use 100-mm visual analog scale speculum placement , tenaculum place , completion procedure . The provider ask rate satisfaction tenaculum placement Likert-type 5 point satisfaction scale . 1 : satisfy , 2 : slightly satisfy , 3 : moderately satisfy , 4 : satisfy , 5 : extremely satisfied . All data collect use REDCap database .
DOC.criteria: Women age 18 year old Undergoing intrauterine device placement English Spanish speak Primary language English Spanish
